description: This pleasant restaurant started life in 1848 as a bastion used by the Habsburg army and was later transformed into an inn. Recognised as a “Locale Storico Veneto”, it’s now run by the third generation of the De Faveri family who serve traditional meat and fish dishes here. Comfortable guestrooms are also available for guests wishing to extend their stay.
